name: Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity

Acceptance Criteria: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
- using the correct and complete set of drawings 
-all drawings are the latest revision
Reference Documents: Drawings and drawing registers
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Services within vicinity of area to be demolished should be identified and marked, and all services to be retained shall be protected
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Extent and location of cuts to be clearly set out and checked prior to saw cutting
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing.
Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task
Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Surplus material, debris and demolished material are to be sorted and transported off site. Material to be kept in condition for re-use where possible.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Site and surrounding environment are to be maintained at a good standard of cleanliness
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan's Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the most current and updated set of complete construction drawings

Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity

Acceptance Criteria: •Confirm bonding cable material & size is correct and in accordance with design drawings.
 •Confirm correct mould type and size is used for required CAD weld connections.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity

Acceptance Criteria: •Confirm bonding loop and connections are positioned in accordance with the most current and updated set of construction drawings. Ensure that all locations are reviewed by a Fulton Hogan engineer.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria: Lay bonding loop in accordance with construction drawings such that it connects to the electric cabinet correctly.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure furniture connections align correctly with structure and are positioned in accordance with the design drawings.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off
2.3 CADWELD Furniture Connections to Bonding Loop
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure correct mould is used when CAD welding furniture connections to bonding loop.
Reference Documents: Eritech CADWELD Exothermic Welding Manual
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure each weld is inspected and that a quality connection has been made. All welds shall be inspected by a Fulton Hogan engineer.
Reference Documents: Eritech CADWELD Exothermic Welding Manual
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off

 - using the correct and complete set of drawings

1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Cold planing shall be carried out in a manner such that a uniform surface is present on a plane parallel with the ultimate finished surface of the pavement
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Responsibility: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor

Acceptance Criteria: Ensure average depth of pavement removed is in accordance with relevant methodologies. Ensure a maximum of 50mm to be removed per pass. After planing, no point on the planed surface shall be positioned more than 15 mm below a 3 m straight edge placed on the planed surface in any direction.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Responsibility: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor
Acceptance Criteria: Any exposed longitudinal edges within the trafficked area shall be ramped down at a slope no steeper than 5 horizontal to 1 vertical.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Responsibility: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor

Acceptance Criteria: Temporary ramping shall not be steeper than 20 horizontal to 1 vertical for traffic speeds of more than 75 km/h or 10 horizontal to 1 vertical for traffic speeds of 75 km/h or less
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Responsibility: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan's Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
